example.parse: (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 时常)) (VP (VV 穿插) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-44 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-44)) (VP (VV 发生) (PP (P 於) (NP (ADJP (JJ 现实)) (NP (NN 生活)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 小)) (NP (NN 故事))) (CC 与) (NP (NN 对白)))))))
